QueryConfig.queryInfo: UPDATE PERSON_INTERFACE SET EMPL_POSITION_TYPE_ID = CONCAT(EMPL_POSITION_TYPE_ID , ' (COM)') WHERE COMMENTS IS NULL AND DATA_SOURCE = 'HALLEY_PERS_INT' AND EMPL_POSITION_TYPE_ID <>'DIRIG';

QueryConfig.queryComm: Cancella le unità organizzative di tipo SERV che arrivano da Halley in quanto in questo momento non vengono utilizzate
QueryConfig.queryInfo: DELETE FROM ORGANIZATION_INTERFACE WHERE ORG_ROLE_TYPE_ID='SERV' AND DATA_SOURCE='HALLEY_ORG_INT';

QueryConfig.queryName: update PERSON_INTERFACE_HIST set CUSTOM_TEXT01 = 'POST' where HIST_JOB_LOG_ID = '#COND0#';
QueryConfig.queryComm: update PERSON_INTERFACE_HIST set CUSTOM_TEXT01 = 'POST' where HIST_JOB_LOG_ID = '#COND0#';
QueryConfig.queryInfo: update PERSON_INTERFACE_HIST set CUSTOM_TEXT01 = 'POST' where HIST_JOB_LOG_ID = '#COND0#';
